mapper.select: select * from auction order by auction_no asc
select * from auction where auction_schedule_no = #{auctionScheduleNo} order by auction_no asc

SELECT A.AUCTION_NO, A.AUCTION_LOT, A.AUCTION_STATE, W.work_title, W.WORK_MATERIALS, W.WORK_CATEGORY FROM work W INNER JOIN auction A ON W.work_no = A.work_no WHERE A.AUCTION_SCHEDULE_NO = #{auctionScheduleNo} order by A.AUCTION_LOT asc

SELECT A.auction_no, A.auction_lot, A.auction_state, A.auction_low_price, A.auction_high_price, A.auction_end_date, W.work_title, W.work_size, W.work_materials, W.work_category, WI.attachment FROM auction A JOIN work W ON A.work_no = W.work_no left JOIN work_image WI ON W.work_no = WI.work WHERE A.auction_schedule_no = #{auctionScheduleNo} ORDER BY A.auction_lot ASC
select auction_schedule_title, auction_schedule_end_date from auction_schedule where auction_schedule_no = #{auctionScheduleNo}
select * from ( select A.auction_no, A.work_no, WI.attachment From auction A inner join work_image WI on A.work_no = WI.work ) where auction_no = #{workNo}
